1.0.1.en: Modified descriptions & added source and bugs url.

1.0.4.en: Remove link to issues from README

1.0.5.en: Fixes wrong temp reading for tool.

1.0.6.en: Ability to specify snapshot url - Translations for printer states

1.0.7.en: SDK3 - Fix translations - Fix onoff trigger - Global snapshot tag - Buttons functional - Paused trigger - Community topic - Improved setup

1.0.8.en: Fix flow_token_already_exists error - Minor translation fix

1.0.9.en: Fixed run listener init - Adds camera in-app

1.1.0.en: Many additions, see the readme.MD on github for the full change-log
1.1.0.nl: Veel toevoegingen, zie de readme.MD op github voor alle veranderingen

1.1.1.en: Fixed the breaking changes by just hiding the old capabilities, instead of deleting them
1.1.1.nl: De brekende wijzigingen verholpen door de oude capabilities te verbergen, in plaats van ze te verwijderen

1.1.2.en: Added 2 triggers (print stopped and resumed). Minor bug fixes.
1.1.2.nl: 2 triggers toegevoegd (print gestopt en hervat). Kleine bug fixes.

1.1.3.en: new maintainter / update to store, NodeJS modules update, added flow actions for Raspberry Reboot / Shutdown (state Operational / Offline or Disconnected)

1.1.4.en: Attempt to fix Could not trigger Flow card

1.1.5.en: Attempt to Fix : Invalid value for token

1.1.6.en: Trigger Flow card with id "print_resumed" fix

1.1.7.en: Shorten file name capability on the device title

1.1.8.en: Multiple fixes - button resets after execution, CANCEL/M112 were not working, added logging for debugging

1.2.0.en: Added a dashboard widget and multi-language translations.

1.2.1.en: Dashboard widget preview fix and multi-language translations.

1.2.2.en: Support of multiple Octoprint instances in the widget

1.2.3.en: Added stream support for camera - works on mobile not on WebApp
